name: Eighteen (DWaM)
description:
You awaken in a house that is not yours. You are haunted by a past that you hope is not yours. You are given a name that you fear can never truly be yours. 

You are Tohya Hachijo.

...Or are you?

In this short interactive experience, take control of an amnesiac looking to find his footing in the home of a strange woman, as he discovers his past -- or runs from it.

This is an Umineko no Naku Koro Ni fangame, made almost entirely with the Episode 5 and Episode 8 manga panels. It presumes that the reader has fully read through all eight Umineko episodes.

This is a short, narrative-driven experience. While it features a plethora of dialogue options that subtly affect aspects of the narrative, there are 4 main paths to take, each bringing you to a wildly different conclusion.
